class.rdfs:comment: The act of expressing a preference from a set of options or a large or unbounded set of choices/options.
class.rdfs:label: ChooseAction

schema:actionOption.rdfs:comment: A sub property of object. The options subject to this action.
schema:actionOption.rdfs:label: actionOption

schema:option.rdfs:comment: A sub property of object. The options subject to this action.
schema:option.rdfs:label: option
